data.comment: The first-half is in progress. Oostende get the game underway.
Faris Haroun for Antwerp has been booked by Erik Lambrechts and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The ref has blown to start the second-half. Antwerp kick-off.
Alexander Blessin (Oostende) is making a first substitution, with Mamadou Thiam replacing Fashion Sakala.
In the minute 70, Nana Opoku Ampomah is replacing Simen Juklerod for the away team.
Oostende make their second substitution with Marko Kvasina replacing Makhtar Gueye.
Goal! A Arthur Theate header gives Oostende a 1-0 lead in Ostend.
In the minute 80, The away team replace Aurelio Buta with Koji Miyoshi.
Goal! Lior Refaelov equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
Cristian Benavente is replacing Dieumerci Mbokani for Antwerp at Versluys Arena.
In the minute 89, At Versluys Arena, Marko Kvasina has been yellow-carded for the home team.
The match has come to a close in Ostend. The final score is 1-1.
